markdown:
<title level="1" right="Creature Family">[Ikeshti](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=294)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #173: Doorway to the Red Star](/Sources.aspx?ID=103) pg. 86</row>

Ikeshtis are reptilian humanoids native to Akiton's wastelands. Smaller than Golarion's [iruxi](/Ancestries.aspx?ID=15), ikeshtis organize around distinct societal roles.

<title level="2">Members</title>
[Ancient Rivener](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1675) (Creature 14), [Ikeshti Brood-Minder](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1674) (Creature 2)

<aside>
<title level="2" noclass="true" icon="/images/Icons/Sidebar_2_AdditionalLore.png">Ikeshti Characteristics</title>

Ikeshtis are reptilian humanoids with a unique evolutionary lifestyle, from the petite ikeshti brood-minders who collectively raise their community's young and the congregants who manage the settlement to the hulking riveners whose tormented exile transforms them into near-mindless, violent juggernauts.
</aside>
name: Ikeshti
